results.title: Oral atenolol treatment for infantile hemangiomas: clinical analysis of 133 consecutive patients
results.text_hl: No recurrence was observed in the six cases, and the clinical results of the six @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were satisfactory. After oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment, 41 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ exhibited residual @<m>DISEASE_Hyperpigmentation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017495 @@@hyperpigmentation@@@ or @DISEASE_Telangiectasis @DISEASE_MESH:D013684 @@@telangiectasia@@@.
